channel.title: Moparscape Client Wont Load!
channel.description:
Ok so i load the moparscape client with the batch file not the java one so i can see what is causing moparscape to close whenever i open it. and i get this... [b]java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\zko34 (Access is de nied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:94) at Update.<init>(Update.java:35) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Some strange error occured, please tell moparisthebest about it. Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
it just opens, loads, closes. ty

item.title: Moparscape Client Wont Load!

@IxR0FL wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

[quote]FileNotFoundException

The file either does not exist or is in the wrong directory.[/quote]

How would i fix this, and i tried redownloading too…[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:4, topic:259758”][quote]FileNotFoundException[/quote]
The file either does not exist or is in the wrong directory.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 08:20:48 am[/size][hr]Bump?
